c:attribute.name: numZones
c:attribute.description: The number of irrigation zones this device controls.

c:attribute.name: controllerState
c:attribute.description: Indicates whether the zone is currently watering or not

c:attribute.name: rainDelayStart
c:attribute.description: The start time of a rain delay. Used together with rainDelayDuration this can be used to define a time range during which the rain delay is active.

c:attribute.name: rainDelayDuration
c:attribute.description: If zero, no rain delay is in affect. If non-zero, this value can be used together with rainDelayStart to define a time range during which the rain delay is active.

c:attribute.name: maxtransitions
c:attribute.description: Maximum number of schedule events this device can support. The schedule cannot allow the user to set more total events than this.

c:attribute.name: maxdailytransitions
c:attribute.description: Maximum number of schedule events per day this device can support.

c:attribute.name: minirrigationtime
c:attribute.description: Minimum time one zone can be watering at a time.

c:attribute.name: maxirrigationtime
c:attribute.description: Maximum time one zone can be watering at a time.

c:attribute.name: budget
c:attribute.description: Default: 100. Setting this number from 10-90 (most devices only support 10% increments) reduces the water usage to that percentage. Setting this number from 110-200) increases water usage for dryer moments. Note: current Orbit devices support 'stacking' meaning if the increased schedule results in a subsequent start time to be delayed, this start time becomes 'stacked' and handled as soon as possible. If the UI supports showing the user what zone is running, supporting budget>100 means the UI will need to compute this stacking. Alternative is to not allow this number to be over 100 (as Iris1 does).

c:attribute.name: zonesinfault
c:attribute.description: Which zones are currently in fault (solenoid jammed, usually). 0 can represent a single pump, if each zone has a pump than pump and/or solenoid should be represented by zonenum.

c:method.name: WaterNowV2
c:method.description: Starts watering the indicated zone for the duration specified.

c:return.description: True for success or false for a failure.
c:return.name: successful

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone number to begin watering.

c:parameter.name: duration
c:parameter.description: How long, in minutes, to water the zone.

c:method.name: CancelV2
c:method.description: Cancels any watering currently in progress.

c:return.description: True for success or false for a failure.
c:return.name: successful

c:parameter.name: zone
c:parameter.description: The zone number to begin watering.

c:return.description: True for success or false for a failure.
c:return.name: successful

c:parameter.name: duration
c:parameter.description: How long, in minutes, to water the zone.

c:return.description: True for success or false for a failure.
c:return.name: successful
